title: Adam Peaty and Katinka Hosszu: Winning mentality in swimming
description:
Olympic champions Adam Peaty and Katinka Hosszu say becoming a world record holder is all to do with their mental preparation. As we celebrate our 100th episode, we find out what sets apart two of the world’s very best swimmers ahead of the FINA World Championships.

LINKS:

Katinka Hosszu Instagram

Ed Knowles Twitter

Andrew Binner Twitter
